name: Greyhound Technologies (Out of Business)
tagline: We Developed For You On Your Demands.
description:
Grey Hound Apps quickly became a global leader in the world of multi-touch, accelerometers, and mobile application design & development. Grey Hound Apps offers custom application development, iphone, android & windows application development, asp.net, HTML5 & open source development, ruby on rails & e-commerce development services also provide by us as well as full life-cycle design for a range of platforms, architectures, technologies and devices.
We have proven expertise in Android apps development that ensures value-added services to your mobile operations.
